title: Eloquent JavaScript
author: Marijn Haverbeke
description: A modern introduction to programming using JavaScript. Covers language fundamentals and practical programming techniques.

title: You Don't Know JS (ES6+)
author: Kyle Simpson
description: Deep dive into core mechanisms of the JavaScript language â€” scope, closures, this, prototypes, and async.

title: JavaScript: The Good Parts
author: Douglas Crockford

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Guidelines and best practices for writing readable, maintainable code. Language-agnostic principles.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt
description: Tips and techniques for pragmatic software development, career advice, and problem solving.
